Header.title: Swiss-German Institute
Header.paragraph: Excellence Award for Your Online Business Reputation

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.text: Our mission is to drive the global online business excellence and help organizations achieve happy and healthy client employee connectedness.

Mission.title: Our Vision
Mission.text: Becoming the leading global awarding institute by promoting highest standards and raising capabilities in the customer excellence, reputation management, and employee happiness.

About.paragraph: Swiss-German Institute was founded on the grounds of promoting and protecting company’s brand so it can be discovered, followed, recommended and even defended in a predominantly digital marketplace. SGI helps organizations globally ensure they manage their online reputation management right. Initially founded in Switzerland, with headquarters moved to Germany, SGI’s cause spans internationally; helping organizations improve their online reputation, brand management, customer service excellence, corporate social responsibility and happiness at work. SGI’s awarding criteria guides organizations on the right path to global reputation and customer service excellence.

Services.name: Online reputation
Services.text: Strengthen the credibility of your brand online and positively influence purchase decisions. Let us review your online public perception of your brand, help you address any negative feedback which might damage your reputation or increase the dominant positioning of your operations online.

Services.name: Customer excellence
Services.text: Boost your excellence in the eyes of your customers. Have a team who embodies business acumen; has product/service knowledge, strong problem-solving and time management skills, and a friendly attitude. Award your accomplishments in the customer excellence area.

Services.name: Community Engagement
Services.text: For a business, engaging your community is the primary way to build a bigger business and gain new customers. Reviewing your social media presence and rating your community engagement is of a pivotal importance today.

Services.name: Happiness at Work
Services.text: Happiness at work is one of the major sources of positive outcomes in the workplace and a pathway to business success. With sophisticated assessment system, we can help you identify the risk stress factor at your office and find strategies for improvement.
